About Us
We are family owned and operated campground situated on 160 acres with a mile of riverfront property. While we're named after the Peace River, we do not claim to be peaceful, especially on busy weekends.
Contact / Locate
Address:
2998 NW Highway 70,
Arcadia, FL 34266
Phone:
863-494-9693
Email:
Store@PeaceRiverCampground.com

Labor Day Weknd~Aug. 29-Sep. 1 {Red Griffin & the Pickin' Crew}
Camp-O-Ween Wknd~Oct. 24-26
Thanksgiving Wknd~Nov. 26-30 {Feast or Famine}

About Us
Located in Arcadia, Florida, Peace River Campground is the best location for outdoor fun in Southwest Florida!
Camping, ATV'ing, Swimming (Pool and River), Fossil Hunting, Entertainment/Activities, Ice Cream Social, Playground, Basketball Court and loads of fun!!
Reserve Online Now!
